title: Judge Faith Jenkins, Terrence J, Single Men, Halle Berry and more.
itunes:title: Judge Faith Jenkins, Terrence J, Single Men, Halle Berry and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The host of Divorce Court got something truly good you. The CLO got a young man with his nose wide open who needs guidance, STAT! Uncle Steve was impressed with Terrence J. Could NFL week 10 be Pimpin's redemption or nah? Tommy finna be 6'1 because of Would You Rather today. LMBAO!!! There is a lie circulating around and the fellas are quick to call it out! Can Cardi B. and Mz. Berry together, make you feed good? Today Steve wraps up the show with a possible ride in the GIV to Vegas with the fellas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
